alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gadsden and southwestern Leon Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Midway to 15 miles south of Quincy. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Springsax Park, Lake Bradford, Lake Talquin, Leon Sinks, Andrew, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Bragg Stadium, Eight Mile Pond, Fort Braden, Leon County Civic Center, Kleman Plaza, Bloxham, Innovation Park and Tallahassee Regional A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
